file.name: preferences.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /checkout/preferences:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
      summary: Create preference
      description: Generate a preference with the information of a product or service and obtain the necessary URL to start the payment flow
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                items:
                  type: array
                  description: Items information.
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        description: Item ID.
                      title:
                        type: string
                        example: Dummy Title
                        description: >-
                          Item title. It will be displayed in the payment
                          process.
                      description:
                        type: string
                        example: Dummy description
                        description: Item description.
                      picture_url:
                        type: string
                        example: http://www.myapp.com/myimage.jpg
                        description: Item image URL.
                      category_id:
                        type: string
                        example: cat123
                        description: Item category ID.
                      quantity:
                        type: number
                        example: 1
                        description: Item quantity.
                      currency_id:
                        type: string
                        example: U$
                        description: Currency ID. ISO_4217 code.
                      unit_price:
                        type: number
                        example: 10
                        description: Unit price.
                payer:
                  type: object
                  description: Buyer Information.
                  properties:
                    name:
                      type: string
                      description: Buyer name.
                    surname:
                      type: string
                      description: Buyer last name.
                    email:
                      type: string
                      description: Buyer e-mail address.
                    phone:
                      type: object
                      description: Buyer phone.
                      properties:
                        area_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Area code.
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Number.
                    identification:
                      type: object
                      description: Personal identification.
                      properties:
                        type:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification Type.
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Number.
                    address:
                      type: object
                      description: Buyer address.
                      properties:
                        zip_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Zip code.
                        street_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Street name.
                        street_number:
                          type: number
                          description: Street number.
                    date_created:
                      type: string
                      format: date
                      description: Registration date.
                payment_methods:
                  type: object
                  description: >-
                    Set up payment methods to be excluded from the payment
                    process.
                  properties:
                    excluded_payment_methods:
                      type: array
                      description: >-
                        Payment methods not allowed in payment process (except
                        account_money).
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Payment method ID.
                    excluded_payment_types:
                      type: array
                      description: Payment types not allowed in payment process.
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Payment method data_type ID.
                    default_payment_method_id:
                      type: string
                      description: >-
                        Payment method to be preferred on the payments methods
                        list.
                    installments:
                      type: number
                      description: >-
                        Maximum number of credit card installments to be
                        accepted.
                    default_installments:
                      type: number
                      description: Prefered number of credit card installments.
                shipments:
                  type: object
                  description: Shipments information.
                  properties:
                    mode:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/shipment_mode'
                    local_pickup:
                      type: boolean
                      description: >-
                        The payer have the option to pick up the shipment in
                        your store (mode:me2 only).
                    dimensions:
                      type: string
                      description: >-
                        Dimensions of the shipment in cm x cm x cm, gr (mode:me2
                        only)
                    default_shipping_method:
                      type: number
                      description: >-
                        Select default shipping method in checkout (mode:me2
                        only).
                    free_methods:
                      type: array
                      description: >-
                        Offer a shipping method as free shipping (mode:me2
                        only).
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: number
                            description: Shipping method ID.
                    cost:
                      type: number
                      description: Shipment cost (mode:custom only).
                    free_shipping:
                      type: boolean
                      description: Free shipping for mode:custom.
                    receiver_address:
                      type: object
                      description: Shipping address.
                      properties:
                        zip_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Zip code.
                        street_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Street name.
                        city_name:
                          type: string
                          description: City name.
                        state_name:
                          type: string
                          description: State name.
                        street_number:
                          type: number
                          description: Street number.
                        floor:
                          type: string
                          description: Floor.
                        apartment:
                          type: string
                          description: Apartment.
                back_urls:
                  type: object
                  description: URLs to return to the sellers website.
                  properties:
                    success:
                      type: string
                      description: Approved payment URL.
                    pending:
                      type: string
                      description: Pending or in process payment URL.
                    failure:
                      type: string
                      description: Canceled payment URL.
                notification_url:
                  type: string
                  description: URL where you'd like to receive a payment notification.
                statement_descriptor:
                  type: string
                  description: >-
                    How will look the payment in the card bill (e.g.:
                    MERCADOPAGO).
                additional_info:
                  type: string
                  description: Additional information.
                auto_return:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/auto_return'
                external_reference:
                  type: string
                  description: Reference you can synchronize with your payment system.
                expires:
                  type: boolean
                  description: Boolean value that determines if a preference expire.
                date_of_expiration:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                  description: Expiration date of cash payment.
                expiration_date_from:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                  description: Date since the preference will be active.
                expiration_date_to:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                  description: Date when the preference will be expired.
                marketplace:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Origin of the payment. Default value: NONE'
                marketplace_fee:
                  type: number
                  description: >-
                    Marketplace's fee charged by application owner. Default
                    value: 0 in local currency
                differential_pricing:
                  type: object
                  description: Differential pricing configuration for this preference.
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: number
                      description: Differential pricing ID.
                tracks:
                  type: array
                  description: >-
                    Tracks to be executed during the users's interaction in the
                    Checkout flow.
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      type:
                        type: string
                        description: Track type. Specifies which tool the values belong to.
                        example: google_ad
                        enum:
                          - google_ad -- Allows configurations for GTM's Google Ads Conversion Tracking tag. Necessary values as conversion_id and conversion_label.
                          - facebook_ad -- Allows configurations for Facebook Pixel. Necessary values as pixel_id.
                      values:
                        type: string
                        description: Configuration values according the track type.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 202809963
                    description: collector_id
                  operation_type:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/operation_type'
                  items:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                          description: id
                        picture_url:
                          type: string
                          description: picture_url
                        title:
                          type: string
                          example: Dummy Item
                          description: title
                        description:
                          type: string
                          example: Multicolor Item
                          description: description
                        category_id:
                          type: string
                          description: category_id
                        currency_id:
                          type: string
                          example: $
                          description: currency_id
                        quantity:
                          type: number
                          example: 1
                          description: quantity
                        unit_price:
                          type: number
                          example: 10
                          description: unit_price
                    description: items
                  payer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      name:
                        type: string
                        description: name
                      surname:
                        type: string
                        description: surname
                      email:
                        type: string
                        description: email
                      date_created:
                        type: string
                        description: date_created
                      phone:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          area_code:
                            type: string
                            description: area_code
                          number:
                            type: string
                            description: number
                        description: phone
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          type:
                            type: string
                            description: type
                          number:
                            type: string
                            description: number
                        description: identification
                      address:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          street_name:
                            type: string
                            description: street_name
                          street_number:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: street_number
                          zip_code:
                            type: string
                            description: zip_code
                        description: address
                    description: payer
                  back_urls:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      success:
                        type: string
                        description: success
                      pending:
                        type: string
                        description: pending
                      failure:
                        type: string
                        description: failure
                    description: back_urls
                  auto_return:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/auto_return'
                  payment_methods:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      excluded_payment_methods:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              description: id
                        description: excluded_payment_methods
                      excluded_payment_types:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              description: id
                        description: excluded_payment_types
                      installments:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: installments
                      default_payment_method_id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: default_payment_method_id
                      default_installments:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: default_installments
                    description: payment_methods
                  client_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 6295877106812064
                    description: client_id
                  marketplace:
                    type: string
                    example: MP-MKT-6295877106812064
                    description: marketplace
                  marketplace_fee:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: marketplace_fee
                  shipments:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      receiver_address:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          zip_code:
                            type: string
                            description: zip_code
                          street_number:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: street_number
                          street_name:
                            type: string
                            description: street_name
                          floor:
                            type: string
                            description: floor
                          apartment:
                            type: string
                            description: apartment
                        description: receiver_address
                    description: shipments
                  notification_url:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: notification_url
                  statement_descriptor:
                    type: string
                    example: MERCADOPAGO
                    description: statement_descriptor
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    description: external_reference
                  additional_info:
                    type: string
                    description: additional_info
                  expires:
                    type: boolean
                    description: expires
                  expiration_date_from:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: expiration_date_from
                  expiration_date_to:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: expiration_date_to
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2018-02-02T19:22:23.535Z
                    description: date_created
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 202809963-920c288b-4ebb-40be-966f-700250fa5370
                    description: id
                  init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: >-
                      https://www.mercadopago.com/mla/checkout/start?pref_id=202809963-920c288b-4ebb-40be-966f-700250fa5370
                    description: init_point
                  sandbox_init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: >-
                      https://sandbox.mercadopago.com/mla/checkout/pay?pref_id=202809963-920c288b-4ebb-40be-966f-700250fa5370
                    description: sandbox_init_point
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - >-
                        collector_does_not_comply_with_current_regulation--identity-validation-required-
                      - invalid_collector_id--collector-id-invalid-
                      - invalid_sponsor_id--sponsor-id-is-not-an-active-user-
                      - >-
                        invalid_collector_email--collector-is-not-collector-email-owner
                      - invalid_operation_type--operation-type-invalid-
                      - invalid_expiration_date_to--expiration-date-to-invalid-
                      - invalid_date--invalid-date-of-expiration-
                      - >-
                        invalid_expiration_date_from--expiration-date-from-invalid-
                      - invalid_items--unit-price-invalid-
                      - invalid_back_urls--back-urls-invalid--Wrong-format
                      - >-
                        invalid_payment_methods--installments-invalid--Should-be-a-number-between-1-and-36-
                      - >-
                        invalid_marketplace_fee--marketplace-fee-must-not-be-greater-than-total-amount-
                      - invalid_id--preference-id-not-found-
                      - invalid_access_token--access-denied
                      - >-
                        invalid_shipments--invalid-type---type---for-field-shipments-cost-
                      - invalid_binary_mode--binary-mode-must-be-boolean-
  /checkout/preferences/search:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
      summary: Search preferences
      description: Find all the information related to generated preferences using specific filters or a specific date range
      parameters:
        - name: sponsor_id
          in: query
          description: The sponsor id
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: external_reference
          in: query
          description: The external reference
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: site_id
          in: query
          description: The site id
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: marketplace
          in: query
          description: The marketplace identifier
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  elements:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                          example: 202809963-a2201f8d-11cb-443f-adf6-de5a42eed67d
                          description: id
                        client_id:
                          type: string
                          example: 6295877106812064
                          description: client_id
                        collector_id:
                          type: number
                          example: 202809963
                          description: collector_id
                        concept_id:
                          type: string
                          format: nullable
                          description: concept_id
                        corporation_id:
                          type: string
                          format: nullable
                          description: corporation_id
                        date_created:
                          type: string
                          example: 2018-02-02T19:18:51.150Z
                          description: date_created
                        expiration_date_from:
                          type: string
                          format: nullable
                          description: expiration_date_from
                        expiration_date_to:
                          type: string
                          format: nullable
                          description: expiration_date_to
                        expires:
                          type: boolean
                          description: expires
                        external_reference:
                          type: string
                          description: external_reference
                        integrator_id:
                          type: string
                          format: nullable
                          description: integrator_id
                        items:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                            example: Test Item
                          description: items
                        last_updated:
                          type: string
                          format: nullable
                          description: last_updated
                        live_mode:
                          type: boolean
                          description: live_mode
                        marketplace:
                          type: string
                          example: NONE
                          description: marketplace
                        operation_type:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/operation_type'
                        payer_email:
                          type: string
                          description: payer_email
                        platform_id:
                          type: string
                          description: platform_id
                        processing_modes:
                          type: string
                          format: nullable
                          description: processing_modes
                        product_id:
                          type: string
                          description: product_id
                        purpose:
                          type: string
                          description: purpose
                        site_id:
                          type: string
                          example: MLA
                          description: site_id
                        sponsor_id:
                          type: number
                          example: 0
                          description: sponsor_id
                    description: elements
                  next_offset:
                    type: number
                    example: 1
                    description: next_offset
                  total:
                    type: number
                    example: 1
                    description: total
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - ds_search_query--invalid-query-
        '401':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - invalid_token--invalid-token-
                      - invalid_caller_id--invalid-caller-id
  /checkout/preferences/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
      summary: Get preference
      description: Check all the payment information for a product or service with the ID of the preference of your choice
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The preference's ID
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  additional_info:
                    type: string
                    description: additional_info
                  auto_return:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/auto_return'
                  back_urls:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      failure:
                        type: string
                        description: failure
                      pending:
                        type: string
                        description: pending
                      success:
                        type: string
                        description: success
                    description: back_urls
                  client_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 6295877106812064
                    description: client_id
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 202809963
                    description: collector_id
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2018-02-02T19:18:51.150Z
                    description: date_created
                  expiration_date_from:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: expiration_date_from
                  expiration_date_to:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: expiration_date_to
                  expires:
                    type: boolean
                    description: expires
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    description: external_reference
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 202809963-a2201f8d-11cb-443f-adf6-de5a42eed67d
                    description: id
                  init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: >-
                      https://www.mercadopago.com/mla/checkout/start?pref_id=202809963-a2201f8d-11cb-443f-adf6-de5a42eed67d
                    description: init_point
                  items:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                          example: item-ID-1234
                          description: id
                        currency_id:
                          type: string
                          example: $
                          description: currency_id
                        title:
                          type: string
                          example: Practical Granite Shirt
                          description: title
                        picture_url:
                          type: string
                          example: http://placehold.it/350x150
                          description: picture_url
                        description:
                          type: string
                          example: >-
                            This is my description
                          description: description
                        category_id:
                          type: string
                          description: category_id
                        quantity:
                          type: number
                          example: 2
                          description: quantity
                        unit_price:
                          type: number
                          example: 14.5
                          description: unit_price
                    description: items
                  marketplace:
                    type: string
                    example: MP-MKT-6295877106812064
                    description: marketplace
                  marketplace_fee:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: marketplace_fee
                  notification_url:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: notification_url
                  statement_descriptor:
                    type: string
                    example: MERCADOPAGO
                    description: statement_descriptor
                  operation_type:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/operation_type'
                  payer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      phone:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          area_code:
                            type: string
                            description: area_code
                          number:
                            type: string
                            example: 631.586.0213
                            description: number
                        description: phone
                      address:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          zip_code:
                            type: string
                            example: 76336
                            description: zip_code
                          street_name:
                            type: string
                            example: Marjory Stream
                            description: street_name
                          street_number:
                            type: string
                            example: 941
                            description: street_number
                        description: address
                      email:
                        type: string
                        description: email
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          number:
                            type: string
                            example: 12345678
                            description: number
                          type:
                            type: string
                            example: DNI
                            description: type
                        description: identification
                      name:
                        type: string
                        description: name
                      surname:
                        type: string
                        description: surname
                      date_created:
                        type: string
                        description: date_created
                    description: payer
                  payment_methods:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      excluded_payment_methods:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              description: id
                        description: excluded_payment_methods
                      default_installments:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: default_installments
                      default_payment_method_id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: default_payment_method_id
                      excluded_payment_types:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              description: id
                        description: excluded_payment_types
                      installments:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: installments
                    description: payment_methods
                  sandbox_init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: >-
                      https://sandbox.mercadopago.com/mla/checkout/pay?pref_id=202809963-a2201f8d-11cb-443f-adf6-de5a42eed67d
                    description: sandbox_init_point
                  shipments:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      receiver_address:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          floor:
                            type: string
                            description: floor
                          zip_code:
                            type: string
                            description: zip_code
                          street_name:
                            type: string
                            description: street_name
                          apartment:
                            type: string
                            description: apartment
                          street_number:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: street_number
                        description: receiver_address
                    description: shipments
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - invalid_collector_id--collector-id-invalid-
                      - invalid_sponsor_id--sponsor-id-is-not-an-active-user-
                      - >-
                        invalid_collector_email--collector-is-not-collector-email-owner-
                      - invalid_operation_type--operation-type-invalid-
                      - invalid_expiration_date_to--expiration-date-to-invalid-
                      - >-
                        invalid_expiration_date_from--expiration-date-from-invalid-
                      - invalid_items--unit-price-invalid-
                      - invalid_payer--payer-email-invalid--Max-length-150-
                      - invalid_back_urls--back-urls-invalid--Wrong-format-
                      - >-
                        invalid_payment_methods--installments-invalid--Should-be-a-number-between-1-and-36-
                      - >-
                        invalid_marketplace_fee--marketplace-fee-must-not-be-greater-than-total-amount-
                      - invalid_id--preference-id-not-found-
                      - invalid_access_token--access-denied-
                      - >-
                        invalid_shipments--Invalid-total-amount--with-me2-it-cannot-be-lesser-than--limit--
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/mobile-checkout'
      summary: Update a preference
      description: Renew the details of a payment preference. Indicate the ID of the preference and send the parameters with the information you want to update
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The preference's ID
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                items:
                  type: array
                  description: Items information.
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        example: 202809963-a2201f8d-11cb-443f-adf6-de5a42eed67d
                        description: Item ID.
                      title:
                        type: string
                        example: Dummy Title
                        description: >-
                          Item title. It will be displayed in the payment
                          process.
                      description:
                        type: string
                        example: Dummy Description
                        description: Item description.
                      picture_url:
                        type: string
                        example: http://www.myapp.com/myimage.jpg
                        description: Item image URL.
                      category_id:
                        type: string
                        example: cat123
                        description: Item category ID.
                      quantity:
                        type: number
                        example: 1
                        description: Item quantity.
                      currency_id:
                        type: string
                        example: U$
                        description: Currency ID. ISO_4217 code.
                      unit_price:
                        type: number
                        example: 10
                        description: Unit price.
                payer:
                  type: object
                  description: Buyer Information.
                  properties:
                    name:
                      type: string
                      description: Buyer name.
                    surname:
                      type: string
                      description: Buyer last name.
                    email:
                      type: string
                      description: Buyer e-mail address.
                    phone:
                      type: object
                      description: Buyer phone.
                      properties:
                        area_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Area code.
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Number.
                    identification:
                      type: object
                      description: Personal identification.
                      properties:
                        type:
                          type: string
                          description: Identification Type.
                        number:
                          type: string
                          description: Number.
                    address:
                      type: object
                      description: Buyer address.
                      properties:
                        zip_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Zip code.
                        street_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Street name.
                        street_number:
                          type: number
                          description: Street number.
                    date_created:
                      type: string
                      format: date
                      description: Registration date.
                payment_methods:
                  type: object
                  description: >-
                    Set up payment methods to be excluded from the payment
                    process.
                  properties:
                    excluded_payment_methods:
                      type: array
                      description: >-
                        Payment methods not allowed in payment process (except
                        account_money).
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Payment method ID.
                    excluded_payment_types:
                      type: array
                      description: Payment types not allowed in payment process.
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: string
                            description: Payment method data_type ID.
                    default_payment_method_id:
                      type: string
                      description: >-
                        Payment method to be preferred on the payments methods
                        list.
                    installments:
                      type: number
                      description: >-
                        Maximum number of credit card installments to be
                        accepted.
                    default_installments:
                      type: number
                      description: Prefered number of credit card installments.
                shipments:
                  type: object
                  description: Shipments information.
                  properties:
                    mode:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/shipment_mode'
                    local_pickup:
                      type: boolean
                      description: >-
                        The payer have the option to pick up the shipment in
                        your store (mode:me2 only).
                    dimensions:
                      type: string
                      description: >-
                        Dimensions of the shipment in cm x cm x cm, gr (mode:me2
                        only)
                    default_shipping_method:
                      type: number
                      description: >-
                        Select default shipping method in checkout (mode:me2
                        only).
                    free_methods:
                      type: array
                      description: >-
                        Offer a shipping method as free shipping (mode:me2
                        only).
                      items:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          id:
                            type: number
                            description: Shipping method ID.
                    cost:
                      type: number
                      description: Shipment cost (mode:custom only).
                    free_shipping:
                      type: boolean
                      description: Free shipping for mode:custom.
                    receiver_address:
                      type: object
                      description: Shipping address.
                      properties:
                        zip_code:
                          type: string
                          description: Zip code.
                        street_name:
                          type: string
                          description: Street name.
                        city_name:
                          type: string
                          description: City name.
                        state_name:
                          type: string
                          description: State name.
                        street_number:
                          type: number
                          description: Street number.
                        floor:
                          type: string
                          description: Floor.
                        apartment:
                          type: string
                          description: Apartment.
                back_urls:
                  type: object
                  description: URLs to return to the sellers website.
                  properties:
                    success:
                      type: string
                      description: Approved payment URL.
                    pending:
                      type: string
                      description: Pending or in process payment URL.
                    failure:
                      type: string
                      description: Canceled payment URL.
                notification_url:
                  type: string
                  description: URL where you'd like to receive a payment notification.
                additional_info:
                  type: string
                  description: Additional information.
                auto_return:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/auto_return'
                external_reference:
                  type: string
                  description: Reference you can synchronize with your payment system.
                expires:
                  type: boolean
                  description: Boolean value that determines if a preference expire.
                date_of_expiration:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                  description: Expiration date of cash payment.
                expiration_date_from:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                  description: Date since the preference will be active.
                expiration_date_to:
                  type: string
                  format: date
                  description: Date when the preference will be expired.
                marketplace:
                  type: string
                  description: 'Origin of the payment. Default value: NONE'
                marketplace_fee:
                  type: number
                  description: >-
                    Marketplace's fee charged by application owner. Default
                    value: 0 in local currency
                differential_pricing:
                  type: object
                  description: Differential pricing configuration for this preference.
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: number
                      description: Differential pricing ID.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  additional_info:
                    type: string
                    description: additional_info
                  auto_return:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/auto_return'
                  back_urls:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      failure:
                        type: string
                        description: failure
                      pending:
                        type: string
                        description: pending
                      success:
                        type: string
                        description: success
                    description: back_urls
                  binary_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    example: false
                  client_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 6295877106812064
                    description: client_id
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 202809963
                    description: collector_id
                  coupon_code:
                    type: object
                  coupon_labels:
                    type: object
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: '2018-02-02T19:22:23.535Z'
                    description: date_created
                  date_of_expiration:
                    type: object
                  expiration_date_from:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: expiration_date_from
                  expiration_date_to:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: expiration_date_to
                  expires:
                    type: boolean
                    example: false
                    description: expires
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    description: external_reference
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 202809963-920c288b-4ebb-40be-966f-700250fa5370
                    description: id
                  init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: >-
                      https://www.mercadopago.com/mla/checkout/start?pref_id=202809963-920c288b-4ebb-40be-966f-700250fa5370
                    description: init_point
                  internal_metadata:
                    type: object
                  items:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                          description: id
                        picture_url:
                          type: string
                          description: picture_url
                        title:
                          type: string
                          example: Dummy Item
                          description: title
                        description:
                          type: string
                          example: Multicolor Item
                          description: description
                        category_id:
                          type: string
                          description: category_id
                        currency_id:
                          type: string
                          example: $
                          description: currency_id
                        quantity:
                          type: number
                          example: 1
                          description: quantity
                        unit_price:
                          type: number
                          example: 10
                          description: unit_price
                    description: items
                  marketplace:
                    type: string
                    example: MP-MKT-6295877106812064
                    description: marketplace
                  marketplace_fee:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: marketplace_fee
                  metadata:
                    type: object
                  notification_url:
                    type: string
                    example: https://url.com.br/notificacao
                    format: nullable
                    description: notification_url
                  operation_type:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/operation_type'
                  payer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      phone:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          area_code:
                            type: string
                            description: area_code
                          number:
                            type: string
                            description: number
                        description: phone
                      address:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          zip_code:
                            type: string
                            description: zip_code
                          street_name:
                            type: string
                            example: Mc Street
                            description: street_name
                          street_number:
                            type: string
                            example: '7304'
                            format: nullable
                            description: street_number
                        description: address
                      email:
                        type: string
                        description: email
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          number:
                            type: string
                            description: number
                          type:
                            type: string
                            description: type
                        description: identification
                      name:
                        type: string
                        description: name
                      surname:
                        type: string
                        description: surname
                      date_created:
                        type: string
                        description: date_created
                      last_purchase:
                        type: object
                    description: payer
                  payment_methods:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      default_card_id:
                        type: object
                      default_payment_method_id:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: default_payment_method_id
                      excluded_payment_methods:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              example: ''
                              description: id
                        description: excluded_payment_methods
                      excluded_payment_types:
                        type: array
                        items:
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              example: ''
                              description: id
                        description: excluded_payment_types
                      installments:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: installments
                      default_installments:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: default_installments
                    description: payment_methods
                  processing_modes:
                    type: object
                  product_id:
                    type: object
                  redirect_urls:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      failure:
                        type: string
                        example: ''
                      pending:
                        type: string
                        example: ''
                      success:
                        type: string
                        example: ''
                  sandbox_init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: >-
                      https://sandbox.mercadopago.com/mla/checkout/pay?pref_id=202809963-920c288b-4ebb-40be-966f-700250fa5370
                    description: sandbox_init_point
                  site_id:
                    type: string
                    example: MLB
                  shipments:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      default_shipping_method:
                        type: object
                      receiver_address:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          zip_code:
                            type: string
                            description: zip_code
                          street_name:
                            type: string
                            description: street_name
                          street_number:
                            type: string
                            format: nullable
                            description: street_number
                          floor:
                            type: string
                            description: floor
                          apartment:
                            type: string
                            description: apartment
                          city_name:
                            type: object
                          state_name:
                            type: object
                          country_name:
                            type: object
                        description: receiver_address
                    description: shipments
                  total_amount:
                    type: object
                  last_updated:
                    type: object
                  statement_descriptor:
                    type: string
                    example: MERCADOPAGO
                    description: statement_descriptor
        '400':
          description: Error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - invalid_collector_id--collector-id-invalid-
                      - invalid_sponsor_id--sponsor-id-is-not-an-active-user-
                      - >-
                        invalid_collector_email--collector-is-not-collector-email-owner
                      - invalid_operation_type--operation-type-invalid-
                      - invalid_expiration_date_to--expiration-date-to-invalid-
                      - invalid_date--invalid-date-of-expiration-

                        invalid_expiration_date_from--expiration-date-from-invalid-
                      - invalid_items--unit-price-invalid-
                      - invalid_back_urls--back-urls-invalid--Wrong-format
                      - >-
                        invalid_payment_methods--installments-invalid--Should-be-a-number-between-1-and-36-
                      - >-
                        invalid_marketplace_fee--marketplace-fee-must-not-be-greater-than-total-amount-
                      - invalid_id--preference-id-not-found-
                      - invalid_access_token--access-denied
                      - >-
                        invalid_shipments--invalid-type---type---for-field-shipments-cost-

components:
  schemas:
    shipment_mode:
      type: string
      description: Shipment mode.
      enum:
        - custom -- Custom shipping.
        - me2 -- Mercado Envos.
        - not_specified -- Shipping mode not specified.
    operation_type:
      type: String
      description: Operation data_type.
      enum:
        - regular_payment -- Normal payment.
        - money_transfer -- Money request.
    auto_return:
      type: String
      description: If specified, your buyers will be redirected back to your site immediately after completing the purchase.
      enum:
        - approved -- The redirection takes place only for approved payments.
        - all -- The redirection takes place only for approved payments, forward compatibility only if we change the default behavior

Error: unmarshal: json: cannot unmarshal object into Go struct field Operation.paths.post.tags of type string
